author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Alien: Earth and creator, Noah Hawley, has succeeded in offering us a strong installment that continues the Alien legacy, while also bringing something new to the table. It embraces the slightly more philosophical side of the franchise and doesn’t skimp on the limb-flying, bloody action, or the ominous tension either. Homage is most obviously paid […]

The post REVIEW: Alien: Earth appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Alien: Earth
